mapper.select: select record_id, issue_id, issue_type from s_issue_sync_fail_record where record_id >= ( select record_id from s_issue_sync_fail_record where operate_type = 2 and sync_system = 2 and sync_result in (-1,0) order by record_id limit #{startIndex},1 ) and operate_type = 2 and sync_system = 2 and sync_result in (-1,0) order by record_id limit #{pageSize}
